"""
This chunk defines imports related to animation management and includes core Panda3D components essential for implementing lerp-based animations. These imports are used in conjunction with various lerp functions (e.g., LerpFunc) to animate properties such as position, rotation, scale, and color of objects within a 3D environment.
"""

"""
Defines AnimMgrBase
"""

import os
import math

from direct.interval.ActorInterval import ActorInterval
from direct.interval.LerpInterval import LerpFunc, LerpPosHprInterval
from direct.interval.MetaInterval import Parallel, Sequence
from panda3d.core import VBase3
from . import ObjectGlobals as OG
from . import AnimGlobals as AG
